content: this legal case involves multiple parties including the republic of estonia the european union eu vl division common property and ü aa the eu filed a lawsuit against vl division common property requesting a change in the owners entry in the land register vl partially satisfied the eus counterclaim which also involved a change in the owners entry in the land register ü aa filed a lawsuit against the eu and vl claiming 54000 euros in arrears the court ruled that the procedural costs would be covered by one party but the exact amount was not specified the court also made decisions regarding the division of joint property including the sale of a real estate property and an apartment the court rejected the defendants claim to divide a car acquired during the marriage the court stated that the procedural costs would be borne by the parties involved the court also mentioned the possibility of appealing the decision within 30 days procedural aid may be granted to cover the costs of the proceedings if certain requirements are met the divorce division of joint property proceedings began in november 2019 and is still ongoing the court has made various decisions and judgments throughout the case considering the applicable laws and evidence presented by the parties the court has also addressed the validity of a partnership agreement and the contributions made by the partners the court has determined the division of assets and the compensation owed to the parties the court has also resolved disputes over the ownership of a vehicle the court has ordered the parties to bear their own procedural costs and the exact amount will be determined separately
